properties.value: Director agent's auto direction has failed to many times so it has been disabled.
Auto direction is currently unavailable because this scene's intention is incomplete.

groups.title: Stage -1 - Check availability based on scene intent configuration

comments.text:
Since auto direction runs on every turn repeated failures would loop endlessly

So we need to disable it if it keeps failing.
Auto direction without a scene intent tends to go off the rails quickly - so at this point we require there to be both a story and phase intention set for auto direct to be available for a scene.
When auto direct is enabled but unavailable due to incomplete scene intention configuration notify the user by setting a notify__ state
